thread.section_title: CustomUSB Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of CustomUSB | customusb.com
thread.title: Courtland Landscape

author: Courtland Landscape
title: Courtland Landscape
text:
I was looking for a new "leave behind" for my client meetings. I see USB drives in all different cool styles, but never have seen them in wood.
i ordered one shipment of the wood style usb drives with my company logo on them...after seeing the mock up i doubled my order. I talked to the sales rep 3-5 times in a few hours and they were a delight to talk. i am using these wooden logo usb drives in a conference this week to give away.
Best company i have ever dealt with over the internet!
Sincerely,
Lance Muller, RLA
Courtland Landscape Architecture & Construction, Inc.
